name: Δntoine
description:
Δntoine is a detective and walking simulator game in 3D created for a student project.

You are Antoine Moreau, a young intern recently hired by the French company Chapuis Crayons.

Today, you are alone in the cold and gloomy open space. This is weird, as the place is usually crowded with customers and workers. There is only one thing left to do: search your colleagues' cubicles to discover the disturbing truth...
